import { useState } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { addDays, timestampToDateTime } from '../../functions' import { AvForm } from 'availity-reactstrap-validation' import ContentBox from '../../contentBox' import FormInput from '../../form/inputForm' import FormSelect from '../../form/selectForm' import FormInputValidation from '../../form/validateInputForm' import FormSelectValidation from '../../form/validateSelectForm' export default (props) => { const { listCity, listProvince } = props return (
) }
